name: Savi Vision Private Limited
description: wholesaler and service provider of proje
overview:
Established in the year 1987, at Delhi, India, we, “Savi Vision Private Limited”, are engaged in wholesaling a comprehensive assortment of Projector, Audio Visual Equipment, Multimedia Projector, Projectors, Electronic Copy Board, Overhead Projector, Slide Projector, Screen, Projector Lamp and Other Accessories. In addition to this, we also provide after sale and installation services for these products.

Our Products: Video & Audio Conference System Mobile Phone Interactive Board & Tablet LED Video Screen

Our Quality Assurance: We always firmly adhere to the quality control measures and therefore, provide flawless products to our respected customers. Our complete product range is procured from the most reliable vendors of the industry.

Why Us? Our vast industry expertise and superior quality products & services have enabled us to achieve the pinnacle of success. We have carved a niche for ourselves in the market as a leading wholesaler and service provider of quality assured products.

Client Satisfaction: Our clients are the base of our business and their satisfaction is the basic mantra for our success in the industry. Our presence in the industry for these many years has made it possible for us to understand the requirements of clients.
